Iowa_City.Iowa City Municipal Airport:
Iowa City Municipal Airport (IATA: IOW, ICAO: KIOW, FAA LID: IOW), is a public use airport located 2 miles (3.2 km) southwest of the central business district of Iowa City, a city, in Johnson County, Iowa, United States. It is the oldest civil airport west of the Mississippi River still in its original location.
It is included in the Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) National Plan of Integrated Airport Systems for 2017–2021, in which it is categorized as a regional general aviation facility.
